title: Ultra Maniac (Ultramaniac - Magical Girl)
synopsis: Fantasies and miracles never interested Ayu Tateishi, a popular second-year student at her middle school. She was content with preserving her image of being cool, calm, and collectedâ€”all to catch the eye of her crush, Tetsushi Kaji. Ayu's carefree youthful days are interrupted by the appearance of Nina Sakura, a new transfer student who turns out to be a witch. As the only person who knows about Nina's ability to cast spells using a mini-computer, Ayu is forced to help Nina with her mission to find the five Holy Stones, qualifying her to marry the prince of the Magic Kingdom.
characters: ['Sakura, Nina', 'Tateishi, Ayu', 'Tsujiai, Hiroki', 'Orihara, Maya', 'Kaji, Tetsushi', 'Kirishima, Yuta', 'Rio', 'Luna', "Nina's Grandfather", 'Tamura-sensei']
